Identity Guard review
Advertisers disclaimer
Disclaimer: Our top ranked sites are reviewed on the basis of our own views, knowledge and expert opinions. We are able to provide you with our free online comparison tool thanks to referral fees we receive from a number of companies that are compared and reviewed on our website. We do not review all products in a given category. We are independently owned and operated and all opinions expressed on this site are our own.

Identity Guard Total Protection represents the most detailed identity theft protection service on the market.

Features
  • Full Identity & Credit Monitoring
  • Mobile & Computer Protection Suite
  • Identity Recovery Plan
  • $1,000,000 Identity Theft Insurance
  • Credit Report Monitoring with All 3 Bureaus
  • Incredibly Easy to Use

Bottom Line: IdentityGuard.com has emerged as our top ranked site for 2017

Visit site

Identity Guard Features

Identity Guard organizes its extensive feature into three broad categories that offer multiple protections against identity theft. The company’s cutting edge technology constantly monitors customer personal and financial transactions to prevent identity theft from destroying everything you own.

Monitoring

During every business day, Identity Guard uses advanced technology to scrutinize customer credit files meticulously. The company immediately alerts customers to credit file changes, as well as receives monthly credit score updates from the three major credit bureaus.

Identity Guard also closely monitors personal information that includes your name and Social Security number. Public record monitoring ensures an identity thief has not stolen your identity and then committed a crime. Customers select the types of alerts they want, including tests, emails, and phone alerts.

Computer Protection

The days of identity thieves opening the mail of victims have gone the way of snail mail. Now, identity thieve invade tablets, laptops, and desktops to steal your identity. Identity Guard created the ZoneAlarm Internet Security Suite that customers download for antivirus, anti-spyware, and firewall protection.

The company also uses proprietary technology to secure your login and credit card information. Keystroke encryption software called PrivacyProtect encrypts every one of your computer keystrokes to prevent malware from snatching your personal information.

Identity Recovery

Compromised personal and financial information creates a labyrinth of problems that sometimes gives victims no hope of restoring their good names. Identity Guard offers Personal Recovery Assistance, which is a feature helps you cancel credit cards and provides advice on the steps to take for contacting lenders and law enforcement. Customers victimized by identity thieves call a toll free number to talk with an identity theft expert employed by Identity Guard. Moreover, Identity Guard offers identity theft insurance and lost wallet protection.

Identity Guard Pricing

Identity Guard offer three pricing plans that vary on price and the number of identity theft services.

  • Identity Guard Essentials:
    The most basic Identity Guard pricing plan costs $9.99 per month. The Essentials plan offers the most basic identity theft features, such as Social Security number monitoring and $1 million in identity theft insurance. As with the other two plans, customers pay only $5 for the first 30 days.
  • Identity Guard Total Protection:
    At only $19.99, Identity Guard customers receive all of the features that come with the Essentials plan, as well as several more features that include quarterly credit scores, public record monitoring, three bureau credit report updates, and personal computer antivirus protection.
  • Identity Guard Platinum:
    The Identity Guard Platinum pricing plan offers everything in the Total Protection plan, with monthly instead of quarterly credit scores. Identity Guard’s premium pricing plan includes three types of memberships that cover individuals, couples, or families. The individual plan costs $19.99 per month, the couple plan costs $22.99 per month covering two adults, and at $24.99 per month, the family pricing plan covers two adults and up to 15 children living in the same household.

The Pros and Cons of Identity Guard

Online reviews from both consumers and identity theft services experts place Identity Guard at the top of the list of identity theft services companies. Identity Guard especially delivers an easy to sign up process, prompt identity theft assistance, extensive credit card monitoring information, and expert customer service that quickly responds to phone and online queries.

Credit Report Monitoring Accuracy

Scour the Internet for Identity Guard reviews and you should come away with the impression that not only does Identity Guard deliver prompt credit reports, the company also presents customers with accurate information. Identity Guard scans all three of your credit files daily to notify you of changes that impact your credit score. The alerts go out in a timely manner via emails, text messages, and phone calls. We applaud the company for encouraging customers to receive alerts through all three communication channels to ensure immediate action.

Websites devoted to reviewing identity theft services companies almost universally praise Identity Guard for providing the contact information of every creditor listed on your credit reports. This saves you time and gets the credit correction ball rolling quickly. Perhaps the biggest pro for the Identity Guard credit report monitoring service is Credit Analyzer, which comprises an online tool that allows you see how financial actions affect your credit score. Very few other identity theft services companies offer such a powerful credit score calculating feature. As mentioned in myriad online reviews, Identity Guard ranks high among similar companies by providing services, such as credit report monitoring, that extend well beyond identity theft protection.

A few customers complained about delays in receiving alerts, but you can attribute that to incomplete information submitted on the alert form. The easy to use form takes just a few minutes to complete.

Identity Theft Assistance

If you discover that one or more identity thieves have poached some of your financial resources and personal information, Identity Guard doesn’t turn its back on frantic customers. Unlike other companies in the same niche, the company gives you $1 million in identity theft insurance coverage, as well as direct contact with the company’s Identity Theft Recovery Unit. The only downside to the insurance is that most, if not all creditors don’t hold victims liable for transactions made by identity thieves. Still, it’s nice to have the peace of mind that Identity Guard has your back.

However, you must send considerable time repairing the damage done by identity thieves. You might lose your strong credit score, which means lenders and credit card companies refuse to give you credit. The Identity Guard Identity Theft Recovery Unit minimizes the time and money you spend attempting to restore your previous credit rating. We meticulously researched Identity Guard’s highly effective theft recovery service, and we couldn’t find even slightly negative feedback from both consumers and industry experts.

Knowledgeable Customer Service

Identity Guard’s highly rated member center allows you to see the status of your protections. The member center also presents updated information on what features and protection you have available to use. Identity Guard smartly encourages customers to register bank and credit cards immediately to prevent a timing gap that identity thieves exploit. The company provides both phone and online customer service, with phone service receiving the higher customer service marks.

On Monday through Friday, from 8am until 11pm EST, you have the option of contacting Identity Guard customer service by phone. That’s an incredible 15-hour window to get customer issues resolved. Identity Guard offers phone customer service on Saturday from 9am to 6pm. We contacted Identity Guard and we were pleasantly surprised to hear a customer service expert just a few seconds after entering the automated phone system. Moreover, customers have the capability to report lost and stolen bank and credit cards by phone.

Easy Sign Up

The Identity Guard sign up page takes very little time to complete. You select the plan that matches your criteria and the Identity Guard website then guides you through a few screens that ask for your personal information, as well as your preferred payment method. There’s never a lag in the time between when you complete the sign up page and when your identity protection commences. After Identity Guard confirms your information, you can review your credit scores and major bureau reports. You have to call customer service to ask for hard copies, although the copies cost nothing.

The Bottom Line

We find Identity Guard to rank as the best identity theft services company in the industry for several reasons. Plan choices allow you to upgrade or downgrade, depending on your tolerance for identity theft risk. None of the pricing plans for the company exceeds $25 per month, as the top plan allows parents to add up to 15 children, at no charge. Identity Guard offers the most comprehensive identity theft protection, but the company takes identity theft services to the next level by also offering computer protection and credit score monitoring.

For consumers that are serious about securing credit data and receiving the best identity theft protection, Identity Guard represents an affordable option that does the best job of keeping you safe from identity thieves.

Disclaimers:

The scores you receive with Identity Guard(R) are provied for educational purposees to help you understand your credit. They are calculated using the information contained in your Equifax, Experian and TransUnion credit files. Lenders use many different credit scoring systems, and the scores you receive with Identity Guard are not the same scores used by lenders to evaluate your credit.
Credit scores are proved by CreditXpert based on data from the credit reporting ureaus.

Copyright © 2017 True Defense. All rights reserved.

RDR Digital INC, is committed to keeping any and all personal information collected of those individuals that visit our website and make use of our online facilities and services accurate, confidential, secure and private. Our privacy policy has been designed and created to ensure those affiliated with RDR Digital INC of our commitment and realization of our obligation not only to meet but to exceed most existing privacy standards.

          

THEREFORE, this Privacy Policy Agreement shall apply to RDR Digital INC , and thus it shall govern any and all data collection and usage thereof. Through the use of http://www.truedefense.org you are herein consenting to the following data procedures expressed within this agreement.

Collection of Information

This website collects various types of information, such as:

  •        Voluntarily provided information which may include your name, address, email address, billing and/or credit card information etc., which may be used when you purchase products and/or services and to deliver the services you have requested.

  

  •        Information automatically collected when visiting our website, which may include cookies, third party tracking technologies and server logs.

                                

Please rest assured that this site shall only collect personal information that you knowingly and willingly provide by way of surveys, completed membership forms, and emails. It is the intent of this site to use personal information only for the purpose for which it was requested and any additional uses specifically provided on this site.

                                                                     

RDR Digital INC may have the occasion to collect anonymous demographic information, such as age, gender, household income, political affiliation, race and religion at a later time.We may also gather information about the type of browser you are using, IP address or type of operating system to assist us in providing and maintaining superior quality service.

It is highly recommended and suggested that you review the privacy policies and statements of any website you choose to use or frequent as a means to better understand the way in which other websites garner, make use of and share information collected.

Use of Information Collected

RDR Digital INC may collect and may make use of personal information to assist in the operation of our website and to ensure delivery of the services you need and request. At times, we may find it necessary to use personally identifiable information as a means to keep you informed of other possible products and/or services that may be available to you from www.truedefense.org . RDR Digital INC  may also be in contact with you with regards to completing surveys and/or research questionnaires related to your opinion of current or potential future services that may be offered.

RDR Digital INC may feel it necessary, from time to time, to make contact with you on behalf of other external business partners with regards to a potential new offer which may be of interest to you. If you consent or show interest in presented offers, then, at that time, specific identifiable information, such as name, email address and/or telephone number, may be shared with the third party.

RDR Digital INC may find it beneficial to share specific data with our trusted partners in an effort to conduct statistical analysis, provide you with email and/or postal mail, deliver support and/or arrange for deliveries to be made. Those third parties shall be strictly prohibited from making use of your personal information, other than to deliver those services which you requested, and as such they are thus required, in accordance with this agreement, to maintain the strictest of confidentiality with regards to all your information.

RDR Digital INC may deem it necessary to follow websites and/or pages that our users may frequent in an effort to gleam what types of services and/or products may be the most popular to customers or the general public.

RDR Digital INC may disclose your personal information, without prior notice to you, only if required to do so in accordance with applicable laws and/or in a good faith belief that such action is deemed necessary or is required in an effort to:

  •        Remain in conformance with any decrees, laws and/or statutes or in an effort to comply with any process which may be served upon RDR Digital INC and/or our website;
  •        Maintain, safeguard and/or preserve all the rights and/or property of RDR Digital INC; and
  •        Perform under demanding conditions in an effort to safeguard the personal safety of users of www.truedefense.org and/or the general public.

Children Under Age of 13

RDR Digital INC does not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from children under the age of thirteen (13) without verifiable parental consent. If it is determined that such information has been inadvertently collected on anyone under the age of thirteen (13), we shall immediately take the necessary steps to ensure that such information is deleted from our system's database. Anyone under the age of thirteen (13) must seek and obtain parent or guardian permission to use this website.

Unsubscribe or Opt-Out

All users and/or visitors to our website have the option to discontinue receiving communication from us and/or reserve the right to discontinue receiving communications by way of email or newsletters. To discontinue or unsubscribe to our website please send an email that you wish to unsubscribe to Unsubscribe@truedefense.org. If you wish to unsubscribe or opt-out from any third party websites, you must go to that specific website to unsubscribe and/or opt-out.

Links to Other Web Sites

Our website does contain links to affiliate and other websites. RDR Digital INC does not claim nor accept responsibility for any privacy policies, practices and/or procedures of other such websites. Therefore, we encourage all users and visitors to be aware when they leave our website and to read the privacy statements of each and every website that collects personally identifiable information. The aforementioned Privacy Policy Agreement applies only and solely to the information collected by our website.

Security

RDR Digital INC shall endeavor and shall take every precaution to maintain adequate physical, procedural and technical security with respect to our offices and information storage facilities so as to prevent any loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure or modification of the user's personal information under our control.

The company also uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) for authentication and private communications in an effort to build users' trust and confidence in the internet and website use by providing simple and secure access and communication of credit card and personal information.  

Changes to Privacy Policy Agreement

RDR Digital INC reserves the right to update and/or change the terms of our privacy policy, and as such we will post those change to our website homepage at www.truedefense.org, so that our users and/or visitors are always aware of the type of information we collect, how it will be used, and under what circumstances, if any, we may disclose such information. If at any point in time RDR Digital INC decides to make use of any personally identifiable information on file, in a manner vastly different from that which was stated when this information was initially collected, the user or users shall be promptly notified by email. Users at that time shall have the option as to whether or not to permit the use of their information in this separate manner.

Acceptance of Terms

Through the use of this website, you are hereby accepting the terms and conditions stipulated within the aforementioned Privacy Policy Agreement. If you are not in agreement with our terms and conditions, then you should refrain from further use of our sites. In addition, your continued use of our website following the posting of any updates or changes to our terms and conditions shall mean that you are in agreement and acceptance of such changes.

USE AND STORAGE GENERAL PRACTICES
